title: From 9% to 90%: How Gemini Transformed Document Extraction
excerpt: Spearheaded a proof-of-concept replacing traditional deep learning with an Image-based Gemini approach for structured data extraction, boosting paystub accuracy from 9% to an industry-leading 90%.

title: Building a Production-Grade LLM Validation Framework
excerpt: Initiated and led the full ML development of a framework to score and analyze production model outputs for quality, building a scalable backend using FastAPI, LangChain, and Docker on GKE via Azure Pipelines.
